tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE resolution_log (
  resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id UUID,
  resolution_date DATE,
  resolution_desc TEXT,
  resolution_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ShippingIncidents (
  incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  ship_name VARCHAR(255),
  resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ShippingResolutions (
  resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id UUID REFERENCES ShippingIncidents(incident_id),
  resolution_date DATE,
  resolution_details TEXT,
  resolved_by VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ShippingLogs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id UUID REFERENCES ShippingIncidents(incident_id),
  resolution_id UUID REFERENCES ShippingResolutions(resolution_id),
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  log_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_description TEXT,
  date_occurred TIMESTAMP,
  resolution TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE shipping_agents (
  agent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_categories (
  category_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_assignments (
  incident_id UUID,
  agent_id INT,
  date_assigned TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES incident_logs(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES shipping_agents(agent_id)
)

CREATE TABLE shipping_incidents (
    incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    resolution VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE incidents_categories (
    category_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE incident_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT REFERENCES shipping_incidents(incident_id),
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT REFERENCES shipping_incidents(incident_id),
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    employee_role VARCHAR(50)
)
